TopicTitle: [WIP] [Plugin] KerbCom Avionics - Analytical engine and RCS thrust balancing

Articles.Content:
Fairly certain it's the latest. It was definitely no earlier than 0.3.0.5 as that seems to be the oldest version I have downloaded, but pretty sure it was 0.3.0.6.

(If that's not the latest, I'm looking in the wrong place and would love to be corrected. )

Ok. 0.3.0.6 is the latest. I will look into this bug and other problems when I get the time. Thanks for the heads up.
